faqData.question: Which platforms will Hollow Knight: Silksong be available on?
faqData.answer: Silksong is confirmed for PC (Steam, GOG), Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X/S. The game will also be available on Nintendo Switch 2 when the console launches.

faqData.question: Will Silksong be available on PlayStation 4 or older consoles?
faqData.answer: No official confirmation has been made for PS4, Xbox One, or older generation consoles. Team Cherry appears to be focusing on current-generation platforms for optimal performance.

faqData.question: Will there be cross-platform save progression?
faqData.answer: Cross-platform save functionality has not been officially confirmed. This feature would depend on platform holder policies and Team Cherry's implementation decisions.

faqData.question: Is Silksong coming to mobile devices?
faqData.answer: There has been no official announcement regarding mobile versions (iOS/Android). Team Cherry has historically focused on PC and console platforms.

faqData.question: Will Silksong support HDR and next-gen console features?
faqData.answer: While not explicitly detailed, the game is being developed for current-generation consoles, suggesting it will take advantage of improved hardware capabilities.

faqData.question: Can I pre-order Silksong on any platform?
faqData.answer: Pre-orders are not yet available on any platform. Team Cherry typically opens pre-orders closer to the official release date announcement.

faqData.question: Will there be platform-exclusive content?
faqData.answer: Team Cherry has not announced any platform-exclusive content. The core Silksong experience is expected to be consistent across all platforms.

faqData.question: What about Steam Deck compatibility?
faqData.answer: While not officially confirmed, Hollow Knight runs excellently on Steam Deck, and Silksong as a PC title is expected to have similar compatibility.
